a.xlink:title: InputNode that processes audio with a std::function callback.
Base class for InputNode's that generate audio samples. Gen's are always mono channel.

Base Node class for sampled audio playback. Can do operations like seek and loop. ...
Fundamental building block for creating an audio processing graph.
General purpose, band-limited oscillator using wavetable lookup.
Phase generator, i.e. ramping waveform that runs from 0 to 1.
Pulse waveform generator with variable pulse width. Based on wavetable lookup of two band-limited saw...
Buffer-based SamplePlayerNode, where all samples are loaded into memory before playback.
File-based SamplePlayerNode, where samples are constantly streamed from file. Suitable for large audi...
